46:2: tan-zee-lul  ki-taa-bi  mi-nal  laa-hil  azee-zil   hakeem

46:10: qul  a-raay-tum  in  kaa-na  min  in-dil  laa-hi   wa-ka-far-tum  bihee  wa-sha-hi-da  shaa-hi-dum  mim  banee  is-raaaee-la  a-laa  mis-lihee  faaa-ma-na  was-tak-bar-tum  in-nal  laa-ha   laa  yah-dil  qaw-maz   zaa-limeen
